name: Scarpa Phantom Tech Mountaineering Boots - Unisex
description: From the smears of the Icefields Parkway to the frozen heights of the Rockies, waterfall ice technicians and fast-and-light alpinists will appreciate the light weight, warmth and precision offered in a single boot. At 20% less weight than a traditional leather mountaineering boot, you'll be able to stay nimble and in synch with the sensitivity and traction provided by the Vibram Zero Gravity soles. Exceptional ice-climbing performance is finished off with a purpose-designed Flexseal zipper® closure to keep in your hard-earned warmth.Gaiters are light and super tough Kevlar-reinforced S-Tech fabric to keep feet dry.Upper/shell is constructed from Cordura, aluminum and Primaloft for warm support.A purpose-designed and highly durable Flexseal® zipper closure eases access.Quick-lace system allows for easy tie-ins with cold or gloved fingers.Insole is made of carbon fibre and EVA for cushioned control.EVA midsoles are light-weight, microporous, and absorb shock.Vibram Zero Gravity soles retain grip and sensitivity.Compatible with all crampon binding systems.
